column2:
"Argh, I can't believe this! I got this
awesome weapon, but I don't have the
skill to equip it!"

"I wish they'd just let us learn all the skills
at once, instead of limiting it like this.
Maybe our bodies just can't handle it?"

"It's a pain in the ass waiting until we have
enough experience to learn skills,
but what are you gonna do?"

"I heard there was a big accident way back
when people had more freedom.
.......I guess it makes sense. "

"You know, these Mags are quite strange.
They eat anything, and even help you out.
I wonder how they work."
"These Darkers, you defeat 'em and defeat 'em and they still keep sprouting, but where on earth do they come from? "

"So do you know about this?
That pop idol that's popular amongst the common folk. "

"There aren't a lot of people talking about her on
the ARKS lobby, of course. But it sounds like
she's super popular."

"She must be REALLY pretty.
Maybe I'll get to meet her one day."

"Hey, have you heard the news? About that
pop idol of course! The i-dol!"
"They say she might pay us a visit!   Oh, man, I can't wait!"
"Dark Falz being revived is awful, but another awful thing happened!"

"What, you ask?ã€€I mean, you know!
That idol, Quna's gig!
Don't you know anything?!"
"I hear it's an epic battle to get tickets! Like seriously!"
"Ohhh......I couldn't get tickets......it's the end of the world. "
"These Darkers, you defeat 'em and defeat 'em and they still keep sprouting, but where on earth do they come from? "

"Seriously, Darkers, get with the program! All this beautiful water around,
but we can't swim because of you! Such a waste......"

"Man, the hostiles on Planet Wopal sure are creepy.
They're definitely not normal, or something. "
"These Darkers, you defeat 'em and defeat 'em and they still keep sprouting, but where on earth do they come from? "

"Man, the hostiles on Planet Wopal sure are creepy.
They're definitely not normal, or something. "
"These Darkers, you defeat 'em and defeat 'em and they still keep sprouting, but where on earth do they come from? "

"I mean, I've been wound up in such a mess.
Seriously man, can't do this. "
